componentType.description: OpenHAB Binding - Interfacing to the openHAB home automation suite

inputPort.description: Value for item1 (name is set via property)

outputPort.description: Output of currentState (name is set via property)
Output of currentDevice (name is set via property)

property.name: updaterate
property.description: update rate of the openHAB items (time in milliseconds)

property.name: hostname
property.description: Base address of the openHAB installation

property.name: port
property.description: Port for connection (default for openHAB: 8080 for non-HTTPS, 8443 for HTTPS)

property.name: protocol
property.description: Protocol to be used for connection, either http or https

property.name: lazyCertificates
property.description: if true, any SSL certificate validation will be deactivated for the given hostname

property.name: username
property.description: Username, if required by openHAB configuration

property.name: password
property.description: Password, if required by openHAB configuration
